sentences.en: A normal working week is 40 hours.
sentences.cn: 一个正常的工作周是40小时。

sentences.en: All I want is to lead a normal life.
sentences.cn: 我想要的只是能过正常的生活。

sentences.en: English food can be wonderful but the normal English diet is abominable.
sentences.cn: 英国也有美食，只是一般的日常饮食太过糟糕。

sentences.en: I play normal bunker shots with an open stance.
sentences.cn: 我打一般的沙坑球采取开立击球姿势。

sentences.en: If he feels hotter than normal, take his temperature.
sentences.cn: 如果他感觉比平时热，量量他的体温。

sentences.en: In November, Clean's bakery produced 50 percent more bread than normal.
sentences.cn: 克林面包房11月份烤的面包比平常多50％。

sentences.en: It is normal practice not to reveal details of a patient's condition.
sentences.cn: 不透露患者病情的细节是惯常的做法。

sentences.en: More than 7 million shares changed hands, treble the normal daily average.
sentences.cn: 有700多万股换手，是通常日平均成交量的3倍。

sentences.en: Normal life is at a standstill, and the economy is faltering.
sentences.cn: 正常生活陷于瘫痪，经济止步不前。

sentences.en: Police and motoring organizations said the roads were slightly busier than normal.
sentences.cn: 警方和一些汽车组织表示，这些公路比平常稍繁忙一些。

sentences.en: She led a normal, happy life with her sister and brother.
sentences.cn: 她和弟弟妹妹一起过着平凡而幸福的生活。

sentences.en: She was assessed in the normal way, and placed on the waiting list.
sentences.cn: 她接受了正常的评估后被列入等候名单。

sentences.en: The device can discriminate between the cancerous and the normal cells.
sentences.cn: 这台仪器可以辨别癌细胞和正常的细胞。

sentences.en: The famine turned the normal modulation of climate into disaster.
sentences.cn: 正常的气候变化因饥荒而成了灾难。

sentences.en: This picture shows the view from a car using normal dipped lights.
sentences.cn: 这幅图片显示的是从一辆使用正常近光灯的汽车上所看到的景色。

sentences.en: Three of the six have comfortably exceeded their normal life expectancy.
sentences.cn: 6人中已经有3人轻松超过了正常的预期寿命。

sentences.en: We can start living a normal life again now.
sentences.cn: 我们现在可以重新过上正常的生活了。

sentences.en: What normal people considered pressure was meat and drink to him.
sentences.cn: 一般人认为有压力的事情在他看来却是快乐无比的事。

words.tran_cn: 规范，基准；定额，分配之工作量
常态；[化学] 当量浓度；[化学] 规定浓度
正常化；标准化；正规化；常态化
使正常化；使规格化，使标准化

phrases.tran_cn: 标准型；正规形式；规格化形式
正常模式；标准振荡方式；自然振荡；固有状态
正常运转；机组运行正常
正规状态；[核子]基态（等于ground state）
法向量；法向向量；法向矢量

trans.tran_en: the usual state, level, or amount
